title: Mansurukiathe Lyrics Karungaali Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Chinmayi
Song: Mansurukiathe
Lyrics:Erode ErivanÂ 
Music Director : Srikanth Deva


Mansurukiathe udal melikirathe
Eppathaan oorariya seruvatho...
Paasam thodarkirathe, aasa vazhkirathe
Eppathaan thazhi katti vazhuvatho..


Pesi pesi unna pathi kettu pochu en puthi
Nenjukulla pacha kuthi nikirene unna suthi
Kalamellam irundhidanum unkoodathaan


Pazhagi vandha vazhkai ellam poiya poguma
Manasa thotta nenapu ellam maraka mudiyuma
Uyir pola nee enna kalandhiruka
Un madisaaya kadaisi vara kathirappen


Endha saami irundha enna unna suthuren
Endha varamum vendam ennaku unn ketkuren
EN usuraga nee vandhu irundhidanum
Un kanna naa kanna moodidanum

seo.title: Mansurukiathe Lyrics Karungaali Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Mansurukiathe Lyrics Karungaali Song Lyrics from Karungaali. Read the lyrics penned by Erode Erivan and composed by Srikanth Deva and sung by Chinmayi. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Erode Erivan, Karungaali, Srikanth Deva, Chinmayi, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
